alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 9:40PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...LOW WATER LEVELS ON THE LOWER TIDAL DELAWARE RIVER EARLY ON SATURDAY... A strong northwest wind will cause low water levels on the lower tidal Delaware River and its tributaries early on Saturday. The low water levels may cause navigation problems around the time of low tide. Water levels are expected to drop between 2 and 3 feet below Mean Lower Low Water from around the Commodore Barry Bridge area to the far upper part of Delaware Bay. Low tide occurs at Reedy Point, Delaware at 4:16 AM Saturday. The northwest wind is expected to diminish on Saturday morning and water levels should begin to return toward normal on Saturday afternoon and Saturday night.
